name: Sunset for Tumblr (Dashboard Theme)
description: I didn't like the latest dashboard update (Oct 2014) so I decided to retheme my dash. I'm sharing it here in case people would like to use it. Enjoy!
additional_info:
- v1.0 Released and working on Chrome as of 1/11/14

By HeyItsJono - http://heyitsjono.deviantart.com | http://kaywhatever.tumblr.com

Regarding the background image; I cannot seem to find the artist. I tried looking but Google Image Search has nothing on it. If anyone knows the source, please notify me so I can credit the artist. Thank you!

HD Preview: http://i.imgur.com/uiorqbT.png
